name: Gqom Valley Nights
description:
Khura is your host and a long time organiser of the Gqom scene in Durban. It's not often that you get to experience a sub culture and party like locals, but that's what this trip is all about. Gqom
 is a style of dance music that originates in Durban, and is taking the 
world by storm. This experience allows you to meet and hang out with the
 orginal gqom crews, in an area of Durban you would never get into 
yourself.
